radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar dependent atelectasis; no evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion; extensive diverticulosis of the entire colon; focal fat stranding and bowel wall thickening of the distal portion of the descending colon consistent with possibly complicated diverticulitis with a small intramural abscess measuring approximately 1.0 x 0.7 cm; no evidence of perforation or fistula; enlarged fibroid uterus; normal right adrenal gland with incompletely characterized left adrenal nodule measuring 9 x 15 mm.
